TopicTitle: ISP and DeltaV Lost after save.

Articles.Content:

Edited December 8, 2014 by Holzfallen
I strongly suspect a known TweakScale bug. Try reverting to 1.44. Otherwise, please read the How to Get Support sticky.

Thank You.

It solved my problem. I found out after a bit of "digging", that my ships weight skyrocketed. So wasn't losing ISP, but DeltaV.
